parameters:
Clea: Let's proceed with caution, especially Leon-san,
please don't move on your own.

Leon the informant: I know, I've seen the monsters swarming
around, so let's proceed with caution.

Clea: There doesn't seem to be anything in particular... Was
it really necessary to hire escorts up to this point?

Informant Leon: N-No way... So, all of that information was
a lie...

Mage Relm: There might have been previous visitors, it seems
to be common in ancient ruins.

Thief Nora: I-I feel like I'm being watched... Maybe it's
just my imagination?

Informant Leon: Damn it, let's go back! I can't stand being
in such a gloomy place!

Mage Relm: I don't know if it's tears or drool, but please
don't put strange things on my face!

Informant Leon: What did you say!? The only time I cry is
when my parents die!

Priestess Sophia: There's water here too...? Where on earth
did this come from--

Thief Nora: U-Upside! There's something up there even though
there's no smell or presence!
Clea: Get ready! A monster is descending!

Informant Leon: I've been chasing after the prince for
years, and this is what it's come to...
Priestess Sophia: Tell me more about the prince--

Thief Nora: P-Please come here! Something has fallen where
the monster was!
Informant Leon: I found it... I found it!

Informant Leon: My dream, my dream... the true orb of Beton
that existed in the literature...!

Informant Leon: What beauty...! Look at this flawless gem
that is worthy of the [Sun Prince]!
Priestess Sophia: Oh, so the prince refers to a jewel!?

Informant Leon: I am an explorer specializing in gemstones,
but that alone doesn't pay the bills, so I work as an
informant...

Informant Leon: I've been searching for the Sun Prince since
I was a child!

Priestess Sophia: I'm fine... sigh, it's just my luck that
the wine ran out at a time like this...

Informant Leon: You guys are the best adventurers! I wish I
could give you a reward other than money...
Mage Relm: The ring that fell, can we take it?
Informant Leon: Of course, this is an additional reward.

Informant Leon: Alright, let's quickly get out of this
place!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
